mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_msg_type_para where status = '1' and paraname like CONCAT('%',#{paraname},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.tb_msg_type_para( msgtype, paracode, paraname, paradesc, idx, paratype, parasize, paraneed, status, summary, isp, adduid, upduid, addtime, updtime) VALUES ( #{msgtype}, #{paracode}, #{paraname}, (select count(1)+1 from tb_msg_type_para) , #{paratype}, #{parasize}, #{paraneed}, #{status}, #{summary}null, #{isp}, #{summary}null, #{summary}null, #{addtime}, #{updtime});
mapper.update: update tb_msg_type_para set status = '2' , updtime = #{updtime} where msgtype = #{msgtype} and isp = #{isp} and paracode = #{paracode}
